hey guys

the thing is like, how would you "steal" a file that is one level up from the published stuff?

Great point BTW. Thinking in advance and wondering about stuff like this keeps we ahead for changes when needed.

cheers,
M4rc0

forgot to mention, as the original question was "how do you protect your identity" i assume you meant only in this zeronet network, within json files. I use docker with volumes, and have backup for the volumes, this is my approach on it. cheers
